scripts._install: echo "### Run Gatrix _install command. ###" && npx gatrix install
scripts.postinstall: echo "### Run Gatrix postinstall command. ###" && npm run _install -- node_modules/gatrix
scripts._uninstall: echo "### Run Gatrix _uninstall command. ###" && npx gatrix uninstall
scripts.preuninstall: echo "### Run Gatrix preuninstall command. ###" && npm run _uninstall -- node_modules/gatrix
scripts.devinstall: echo "### Run Gatrix devinstall command. ###" && npm run _install -- node_modules/gatrix
scripts._global_install: echo "### Run Gatrix _global_install command. ###" && gatrix install
